statements: SELECT * FROM ingredients
SELECT id, name FROM ingredients WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT name, quantity FROM ingredients WHERE unit='pcs'
SELECT * FROM ingredients ORDER BY quantity ASC
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM ingredients WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY name DESC, id ASC
SELECT name, unit, quantity FROM ingredients WHERE unit = 'oz' OR unit = 'cups'
SELECT name, quantity*2 AS doubled_quantity FROM ingredients WHERE quantity < 50
SELECT id, name, unit FROM ingredients WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT id, name, unit, quantity FROM ingredients ORDER BY quantity DESC, name
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE ingredient_id = 1;
SELECT ingredient_name, quantity FROM ingredients ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT list_name, quantity_needed, ingredient_name FROM shopping_list INNER JOIN ingredients ON shopping_list.ingredient_id = ingredients.ingredient_id;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE unit = 'gram';
SELECT list_name, quantity_needed FROM shopping_list ORDER BY quantity_needed ASC;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY ingredient_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT ingredient_name, unit FROM ingredients WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY quantity DESC;

SELECT ingredients.ingredient_name, shopping_list.quantity_needed FROM ingredients JOIN shopping_list ON ingredients.ingredient_id = shopping_list.ingredient_id WHERE shopping_list.quantity_needed >= 20 ORDER BY shopping_list.list_name ASC, ingredients.ingredient_name DESC;
SELECT list_name, quantity_needed FROM shopping_list WHERE list_id % 2 = 0 ORDER BY quantity_needed DESC;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity, AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM ingredients;
SELECT * FROM ingredients;
SELECT name, quantity FROM ingredients ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT name, unit FROM ingredients WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT name, description FROM recipes WHERE preparation_time < 30;
SELECT list_id, name, completed FROM shopping_list WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE quantity >= 100 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, quantity, unit FROM ingredients WHERE name LIKE 'salt%' AND quantity < 50;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT recipe_id, name FROM recipes WHERE preparation_time < 60;
SELECT * FROM shopping_list WHERE completed = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM ingredients WHERE unit = 'kg';
SELECT id, description FROM recipes WHERE id < 5;
SELECT * FROM meal_plans WHERE planned_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT name, created_date FROM shopping_lists ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, expiration_date FROM ingredients WHERE unit = 'oz' ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE name LIKE '%Chicken%' AND description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, name, planned_date FROM meal_plans WHERE planned_date >= '2022-10-01' ORDER BY planned_date DESC;
SELECT name, created_date FROM shopping_lists WHERE created_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE ingredient_name = 'Salt';
SELECT meal_name, servings FROM meals WHERE meal_id = 1;
SELECT list_name FROM shopping_lists WHERE list_id = 3;
SELECT ingredient_name, quantity FROM ingredients ORDER BY quantity DESC;

SELECT meal_name, ingredient_name, quantity FROM meals JOIN meal_ingredients ON meals.meal_id = meal_ingredients.meal_id JOIN ingredients ON meal_ingredients.ingredient_id = ingredients.ingredient_id WHERE meals.meal_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM meals;
SELECT meal_id, meal_name, servings FROM meals WHERE servings > 5 ORDER BY meal_name DESC;
SELECT ingredient_name, quantity FROM ingredients INNER JOIN meal_ingredients ON ingredients.ingredient_id = meal_ingredients.ingredient_id WHERE meal_id = 1;

SELECT meal_name, ingredient_name, quantity FROM meals INNER JOIN meal_ingredients ON meals.meal_id = meal_ingredients.meal_id INNER JOIN ingredients ON meal_ingredients.ingredient_id = ingredients.ingredient_id ORDER BY meal_name, quantity DESC;

SELECT list_name, ingredient_name, quantity FROM shopping_lists INNER JOIN list_items ON shopping_lists.list_id = list_items.list_id INNER JOIN ingredients ON list_items.ingredient_id = ingredients.ingredient_id WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY list_name, quantity ASC;
